程序包 org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.jdbc.adapter

类 AbstractStatementAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.jdbc.adapter.WrapperAdapter
      • org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.jdbc.unsupported.AbstractUnsupportedOperationStatement
        • org.apache.shardingsphere.driver.jdbc.adapter.AbstractStatementAdapter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AutoCloseable, Statement, Wrapper
    直接已知子类:
    AbstractUnsupportedOperationPreparedStatement, ShardingSphereStatement
    public abstract class AbstractStatementAdapter
extends AbstractUnsupportedOperationStatement
    Adapter for Statement.
